entries.content: Starting research: User wants to log events when pressing plus button and selecting providers. Need to trace the complete event flow.
Adding new event: UI_PROVIDER_CREATED to emit when user selects provider from popup, alongside INPUT_REFOCUS_REQUESTED
User confirmed CHAT_PROVIDER_SELECTED event is working! Now need to make thinking toggle listen to this event and show/hide based on provider capabilities

Successfully implemented thinking toggle provider selection event integration. User tested and confirmed working - thinking toggle now appears/disappears instantly when selecting providers from popup based on their supportsThinking capability.
